ygData.subject: Re: cams
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know it is the same bow that you would get using normal cams. However, my friend has only made one attempt to make a bow using a cam, and it was a
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know it is the same bow that you would get using normal cams.
However, my friend has only made one attempt to make a bow using a cam, and
it was a tinkered cam. I assume however that it is the same as using a
store bought cam.

Rexus
Gnome Wizard <Veeshan>

At 10:41 PM 8/13/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: "Xillitil of Povar" <xillitil@...>
>
>
>
>Do tinkered cams work same as the ones from the vendor, or is it a special
>bow?
>
>Xillitil/Povar
>
>>
>>From: The Cleaner <thecleaner1@...>
>>
>> The cams do work. A member of my guild is a fletcher. He used a cam I
>>tinkered for him and successfully made a very nice bow. I will try to get
>>stats and a screen shot and send it into the web page.
>>
>>Rexus
>>Gnome Wizard <Veeshan>
>>
>>
